results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = Sum_{j=k..n} mu(j).
comment: Left border = A002321, the Mertens sequence.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
formula: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = Sum_{j=k..n} mu(j), where mu(n) = A008683: (1, -1, -1, 0, -1, 1, -1, 0, 0, 1, -1, ...).
example: First few rows of the triangle =
mathematica: Table[Sum[MoebiusMu@ j, {j, k, n}], {n, 14}, {k, n}] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 17 2015 *)
program: a143158_tabl = map (map sum . init . tails) a054527_tabl
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 27 2008
ext: 47th term = T(10,2) corrected by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 04 2015
